oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Improved coupling for aperture coupled microstrip antennas
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GIRISH KUMAR
RATHI, V
RAY, KP
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: electric impedance
microstrip antennas
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Aperture shape and size are the crucial parameters for the aperture coupled microstrip antennas (ACMSA). A systematic comparision of various aperture shapes for the aperture coupled rectangular microstrip antenna has been carried out. An optimum “hour glass”-shaped aperture configuration has been proposed for maximum coupling.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: IEEE Transactions on Antennas and Propagation 44(8), 1196-98
